title: For the TDR calculation, the Planning Authority has to include all the necessary items from the project proponent as required for the effective compliance of the said project
clause_text: For the TDR calculation, the Planning Authority has to include all the necessary items from the project proponent as required for the effective compliance of the said project. In the said Technical Sanction, cost of movable items should not be considered by the project proponent. Also these movable items should not be included in the budget or TDR calculation. Such movable items will not be procured through this project.
section: Construction Amenity TDR in Sq.m. = A / B * (2) 1.35 Where,
